Name: Bob Help Them
About the game: Bob Help Them is a timer-based game, where your goal is to help all NPC's, gathering resources, cooking food, fishing, and chopping wood before the timer ends. Features 35 Different levels. 6 NPC's with different quests. 105 Stars to get!
